Function Documentation

double calcAngle ( Point  p1,
Point  p2 
)

Calculates the angle that is created from the two points.

Calculates the angle in radians that the second point makes with the first.

Parameters:
p1 The first Point.
p2 The second Point.
Returns:
double The angle in radians that point 2 makes with point 1.

double  x2,
double  y2 
)

Calculates the angle that is created from the two points.

Calculates the angle in radians that the second point makes with the first.

Parameters:

y1 The y location of point 1.
x2 The x location of point 2.
y2 The y location of point 2.
Returns:
double The angle in radians that point 2 makes with point 1.
